detaileddescription.para: Linphone quality report sub object storing address related information.
Linphone quality report sub object storing media metrics information as required by RFC6035.
Linphone quality report main object created by function linphone_reporting_new(). It contains all fields required by RFC6035

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* LinphoneQualityReportingReportSendCb) (const LinphoneCall *call, SalStreamType stream_type, const LinphoneContent *content)
memberdef.name: LinphoneQualityReportingReportSendCb

detaileddescription.para:
Fill media information about a given call. This function must be called before stopping the media stream.
call
LinphoneCall object to consider
stats_type
the media type (LINPHONE_CALL_STATS_AUDIO or LINPHONE_CALL_STATS_VIDEO)

Fill IP information about a given call. This function must be called each time call state is 'LinphoneCallStreamsRunning' since IP might be updated (if we found a direct route between caller and callee for example). When call is starting, remote IP/port might be the proxy ones to which callee is registered
call
LinphoneCall object to consider

Publish a session report. This function should be called when session terminates, media change (codec change or session fork), session terminates due to no media packets being received.
call
LinphoneCall object to consider
call_term
whether the call has ended or is continuing
error code. 0 for success, positive value otherwise.

Publish an interval report. This function should be used for periodic interval
call
LinphoneCall object to consider
error code. 0 for success, positive value otherwise.

Update publish reports with newly sent/received RTCP-XR packets (if available).
call
LinphoneCall object to consider
stats_type
the media type

inbodydescription.para: < received_rtcp field of LinphoneCallStats object has been updated
< sent_rtcp field of LinphoneCallStats object has been updated
< received_rtcp field of LinphoneCallStats object has been updated

detaileddescription.para:
Update publish reports on call state change.
call
LinphoneCall object to consider

Setter of the #LinphoneQualityReportingReportSendCb callback method which is notified each time a report will be submitted to the collector, if quality reporting is enabled
call
LinphoneCall object to consider
cb
#LinphoneQualityReportingReportSendCb callback function to notify
